name: 王伯雅
objective: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的英語測驗，如全民英檢、托福測驗、TOEIC 測驗或類似性質的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
schedule:
Week 1 0218-0222	Orientation
Week 2 0225-0301	Complete Listening practice
Week 3 0304-0308	Listening training /Vocabulary
Week 4 0311-0315	Listening training /Vocabulary
Week 5 0318-0322	Listening training /Vocabulary
Week 6 0325-0329	Complete Reading practice
Week 7 0401-0405	0403-0405 day off
Week 0408-0412	Mock Test1
Week 9 0415-0419	0416 Schoolwide Proficiency Test
Week 10 0422-0426	Reading training/Vocabulary
Week 11 0429-0503	Reading training/Vocabulary
Week 12 0506-0510	Grammar
Week 13 0513-0517	Grammar
Week 14 0520-0524	Mock Test 2 
Week 15 0527-0531	Grammar
Week 16 0603-0607	Grammar
Week 17 0610-0614   	Mock Test 3
Week 18 0107-0111	Final exam & make-up tests
scorePolicy:
	 Class attendance and in-class participation (25%) 
	 Weekly homework, Quiz (30%) 
	 Textbook exams (45%)
